synopsis.text: Junbei's life is turned upside down when he attends a fateful rock concert. A dying man passes him a floppy disk containing confidential plans for a dangerous new weapon system. This draws Junbei and his friends at the Rutz Detective Agency into a perilous web of political intrigue. They discover powerful figures who will stop at nothing to retrieve the disk. As the heroes evade attacks and unravel the mystery, it becomes clear the disk's secrets could have disastrous consequences. Junbei and the team race against time, using their sleuthing skills to foil a deadly plot. Lives hang in the balance as they navigate this treacherous new world. Will the detectives outwit the shadowy forces aligned against them? The clock is ticking to prevent catastrophe in this thrill-ride where no one can be trusted and danger lurks around every corner.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
